name: Mini Luminous Silk Perfect Glow Flawless Oil-Free Foundation
about: What it is:u00a0An award-winning, oil-free liquid foundation that delivers buildable medium coverage and a luminous, glowy-skin finish for a natural makeup look...30ml Full Size for everyday use18ml Travel Size for on-the-go..Coverage:u00a0Medium..Finish:u00a0Radiant..Formulation:u00a0Liquid..What Else You Need to Know: This lightweight foundation with Microu2013filu2122 technology allows color pigments to lay flat for seamless blending and layering. A makeup artist and celebrity favorite, this hydrating foundation helps improve skin texture and blur imperfections, all while delivering a long-lasting, lit-from-within glow
ingredients: -Micro-Fil Technology: Provides a translucent radiance and flawless finish...Aqua / Water, Cyclopentasiloxane, Glycerin, Isododecane, Alcohol Denat., Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, Cetyl Peg/Ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Hexyl Laurate, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Phenoxyethanol, Acetylated Glycol Stearate, Magnesium Sulfate, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Trihydroxystearin, Cellulose Gum, Nylon-12, Limonene, Benzyl Salicylate, Benzyl Alcohol, Linalool, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Isobutane, Diphenyl Dimethicone, Acrylonitrile/Methyl Methacrylate/Vinylidene Chloridecopolymer, Parfum / Fragrance, Disodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Methylparaben, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Aluminum Hydroxide, Hexyl Cinnamal.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-For a glowing, airbrushed foundation finish, apply the foundation to the center of the face and blend outward using a foundation brush..-Apply using a damp sponge for a more dewy, luminous makeup look..-Add more layers for seamless coverage with a natural, flawless skin finish..-Use Luminous Silk Glow Setting Powder (sold separately) over the foundation for a longer-lasting makeup result..Makeup looks:.u2022 Luminous Silk Foundation can be used for your everyday no-makeup makeup look.u2022 Use to achieve a soft glam makeup look; perfect for wedding makeup, or wedding guest makeup.u2022 Use to achieve a glass skin makeup look with a glowy finish

reviews.review_text: this is a good product. I am OBSESSED w my Dior foundation but this is second to best. Gives you a natural look

reviews.review_title: Finally the perfect foundation for my skin!
reviews.review_text: Absolutely loved this foundation! I have a bit of texture on my cheeks and usually find foundation tends to emphasize that but this on is the perfect consistency that Iu2019ve been searching for all along. Itis  It is a bit on the light coverage side so I have to build it up a tad. It leaves such a beautiful glow on my skin and the shades are just so versatile! Love it love it love it!
Oh my gosh!! The best foundation hands downud83dude4c So natural looking. You could honestly get away without using a setting powder with this foundation.

I've used this product in the past and it is changed. I was not impressed at all and furthermore I didn't receive the free gifts that I chose and when I called Sephora they told me oh well too bad for you. Not in those words so much but that's pretty much what I got.  If you're 50 or over unless you have perfect skin I don't think this is going to work for you. I should have stayed with lancome.

I love this foundation! It offers excellent coverage while maintaining a natural, skin-like finish. It blends seamlessly, leaving a flawless look without feeling heavy or cakey. I barely notice I'm wearing makeup, yet it still provides long-lasting coverage throughout the day. Perfect for anyone who wants a radiant, breathable finish!
Love this foundation! I definitely get the hype! Itu2019s hydrating and blurring. I do find it oxidizing a bit but nothing too bad

I love this foundation!  It blends so easily, and the color is a great match. I took a chance and bought this offline. I've been a loyal NARS foundation user for years, but it's not been looking great on me lately. It's too orangey & I can't seem to find a good shade. I saw a tutorial about trying to find the right shade, and she said this was easy to match. It does have a bit of a medicinal smell at first, but my smell is ridiculously good, so others might not notice it. It's not bad at all, though, and dissipates quickly after application. I use a very small amount because I just need light coverage. I'm so happy I gave this a shot. Even though it's pricey, it's worth it. My picture was taken after a day of wear. I always rub some off around my mouth when I eat. So, it's not the best picture. but very natural and light feeling.
This is a lovely product however it just didn't sit well on my mature skin.  I much prefer the Bobbi Brown foundation.

I used the smashbox studio skin for yeaarrss and they recently changed the formula and made it absolutely unwearable for me. I have dry very excema prone skin and this foundation leaves me with the most delicious natural finish. Canu2019t recommend enough

Girlies I'm gonna be so frfr okay, this foundation is good, but tbh I don't feel like it's worth the price. Yes it's not cakey or anything, but I feel like it's similar to the Huda Beauty foundation (I must say thought that this foundation is just a bit better though). But I feel like they're similar enough to not justify a $30 price gap... I'm not being a broke girlie I'm just telling you what's good for your money,,, or if you want an expensive and good one, try Chanel ladies xx
My skin glows, long lasting, buildable coverage. Iu2019ve been using Fenty for years, but found it to be a bit too dull.
Iu2019ve used this for years and it gives nice coverage without looking heavy or settling into fine lines. Havenu2019t found anything I like as much.

Iu2019m surprised at the negative review. Iu2019m not an everyday makeup person and want something that looks natural. This looks better than my Dior Air Flash. However I did prep my skin more and tried Mac fix plus under my makeup this time. This does not oxidize how the Dior Air Flash would which is great. I wanted to cover up redness on my face so I first applied with a sigma flat head brush then blending out with a beauty blender. I used MDSolarSciences sunscreen underneath. I wore at thanksgiving so it did wear around my chin some but was not noticeable. I was a little shiny in my T zone (I have normal to dry skin) but powder fixed it right up. I used Charlotte Tilbury airbrush flawless setting powder and Fenty Pro Filtu2019r soft matte longware powder foundation. Spayed Mac fix plus all over and pressed in with a beauty blender. No concealer. I did set my foundation under my eyes quickly to help reduce creasing. Did crease as much as other foundation and skin tints Iu2019ve tried. I multiple compliments on my u201ccomplexionu201d. I wear the lightest shade in just about everything and fair neutral worked well for me. Iu2019d say go for it! Itu2019s expensive but did not disappoint!

Not worth thee hype. The foundation smells like paint and leaves your face looking cakey. It was also super drying even after prepping my skin. I have combo skin I get oily in my T zone. I really wanted to like this foundation since I heard amazing reviews from influencers.

Liquid perfection! This foundation has a luminous yet natural finish that matches my skin tone perfectly (I wear shade 4.5). The texture is light, blends easily, and lasts all day without oxidizing. It's great for special events and long-lasting looks. Worth every penny. I will be repurchasing it!
love love this foundation, it feels like skin and does not look cakey at all! easily buildable and breathable - new fav!!
Best foundation ever. I tried lots of foundation and this is by far the best. Itu2019s covers and also look super natural. Super expensive but itu2019s worth.

Blends like silk and doesnu2019t look splotchy. My skin looks super smooth after applying. It says itu2019s medium coverage, but I have angry blemish prone skin and it covered everything really nicely! It does have a very slight smell to it, but that doesnu2019t bother me much and I only smelled it when first applying.

reviews.review_title: The only foundation I really trust
reviews.review_text: The perfect finish. Makes playing with creams and liquids so easy. Finally found a match for my olive skin.
This foundation was recommended to me and I immediately loved it & how lightweight it is.

I have three foundations in my life that I cycle through and this is one of them.  It has great coverage, lasts forever, and makes my skin look flawless.  I hadnu2019t used it in awhile and bought during saleu2026worth the money.

This foundation blew me away! The coverage is beautiful, color match perfect, the way it looks so natural, your skin but better!! Just WOW! bought the mini size, but going to buy the full size, because it did take 3 full pumps to get the coverage I wanted for hyperpigmentation, however did not look cakey at all! The foundation itself is a very thin consistency, which makes sense since itu2019s oil free. If youu2019re thinking to buy this, do it! Even for my dry skin people, this does not disappoint! It sits very beautifully on the skin, does not feel drying at all, but gives a smooth glowy matte finish! Does not crease or settle into fine lines! My friend said it looks like a filter in real life! The foundation does everything it claims to do!

Love using this foundation for all-day wear. Doesnu2019t irritate my skin and I like the formula, not too dry or oily and I have combination skin. Never had a foundation that had a perfect color match, definitely repurchasing!
This is my favorite foundation ever!!! I have fairly sensitive skin, and have bounced between foundations for a while. And most of them broke me out. But this foundation is so nice. I love it

Definitely worth the hype! I love this foundation! Itu2019s worth every penny! Everytime I wear it, my pastors wife says, u201c you got Armani on today?u201d Itu2019s so beautiful and for those saying it sucks, I wonder if youu2019re skin prepping properly. Which is: good cleanse, toner, serum (I usually put hylaronic acid from the ordinary), then a good moisturizer and then primer. Skin prepping is everything. If you needed a reason to buy this, itu2019s right here. Iu2019m telling you, buy it ud83eude77ud83eude77ud83eude77

This has been on my wish list for years, because so many people have preached that this is one of the best foundations to ever exist. It took forever to actually shade match, because no stores in my entire state sell this in-person, but I finally got it, and I can confidently say it is not worth it. It isn't the worst foundation ever, but it is not even anywhere close to the top and I expect more from something this expensive and hyped. I have combo skin (oily t-zone).

Gorgeous finish! Looks very natural and feels super light. I love the feel of it. Perfect color match and good for a no makeup, makeup look. Also works in high humidity/hot climate, not greasy. Love it so much! Will purchase again.
Holly grail. Nothing compares. Truly the best glowy, natural. Run
Stunning foundation. I always return to this one. Great for my combo skin.

reviews.review_title: Not great If You Have Wrinkles
reviews.review_text: I was disappointed when I tried this foundation.  I was trying to find something close to Chanel's Ultra Le Teint Velvet.  They have discontinued it.  This foundation was highly recommended on several sites for women over 40.  I am 58 years old and I do have some wrinkles.  It does not work well if you have wrinkles.  It accentuates your wrinkles.  Plus, it does not have a natural look which is what I like.  I will be returning it.

YAAAY, so I tried this after learning my go-to Bobbi Brown foundation is being discontinued. Iu2019m blown away, this exceeded all expectations itu2019s legit the best foundation Iu2019ve ever used. Iu2019m matted yet glowing at the same time! u2665ufe0f Only thing is itu2019s pricey & you get less (smaller bottle). Now that Iu2019ve tried it, itu2019s too late for me, the hook is in & Iu2019ll still pay the higher price for such great quality!

Wanted so badly to love this after all of the hype. While the formula is a perfect match for my complexion it left my skin feeling dry and the finish was more matte than I expected. That said I do wish they would add sunscreen and some moisturizers to give this a more dewy finish. Itu2019s pricey and you will need a sunscreen.

My review is poor simply due to the fact that I wanted this product and went to a kohls Sephora location that did not carry it. I ordered the item online and got notification that it arrived, yay! When I got home the box was sealed and empty except for a sample shampoo & conditioner! I contacted customer support who told me u201cif she is able to resend it without charge she willu201d, and threw in some extrasu2026again shampoo & conditioner samples along with foundation samples, shipped standard so another 5 days!! This is terrible on their part, should have been priority shipping but first time order & likely last. Iu2019ll order direct next time
Love it! Goes on like silk and very light weight.
Never found a foundation that worked for me until now. Pricey but worth every penny. New makeup staple.
This dried out my skin and just looked super chalky.  Not at all what I expected especially for the price.

This is as good as any other foundation you can buy, even at the drug store. The price doesnu2019t reflect the quality but I have bought it multiple times for the shade alone because I struggle to find foundation that matches my skin.
I got the wrong shade, BUT this foundation looks so beautiful on the skin. I was looking for a foundation to replace my holy grail foundation (Double Wear by EL), and Luminous silk is the one!

reviews.review_title: Doesnu2019t Live up to the Hype for Textured Skin
reviews.review_text: This just did not work for my textured skin. Even with good skin prep and moisturizing it emphasized texture and wrinkles.

This is an ncredible foundation! I have shades 4,5 and 5.  I am especially grateful for the generous volume of the miniature.  I have normal skin with combined areas on my nose and chin, and I also have large pores on and around my nose. I am 33 years old and have some deep wrinkles around my nose and tiny ones around eyes. I don't know why I didn't try this foundation before, I guess the words Luminous and Glow in the name put me off.  But this is not true at all. Foundation goes on beautifully and can be manipulated from very light to a good medium coverage. It lays nicely around the eyes and often replaces my concealer. What struck me is that foundation is self matted during fixation. But at the same time, it does not tighten my skin in a strange way and lies almost untraceable in areas with wide pores.  It's not shiny and greasy, it looks like your skin but better. Lies perfectly from morning to late night. Unless I'm planning a long day, I don't use powder with it. If I know I need my makeup to last for 8+ hours, then I go lightly with loose powder and use blotting paper only if it's too hot outside. All in all, it's a great product that I'm very happy with and that fills a lot of my needs. Absolutely recommend it!

reviews.review_title: Best for no -make up makeup look
reviews.review_text: 6.25 was a perfect match for me! The foundation is so easy to apply, true to itu2019s name and has a medium coverage and just becomes second skin like. The only foundation that my husband has truly ever liked!

Been wanting to try this foundation for awhile since I have seen so many great reviews about it, Iu2019m glad I finally decided to purchase it and try it out and I must say I was so impressed and loved how it looked on my skin.   I had

I found the foundation to be pretty dry and not complementing of my skin. I definitely prefer the.HAUS labs foundation and actually love Revlonu2019s skin caring foundation.  They both have a nicer finish and are more hydrating.
I wish I learned my actual shade before I got this but besides the sunscreen sort of feel I really like this foundation. Itu2019s still too much money though, even for a mini in my opinion.
Iu2019ve tried all the foundations and at 44 years of ageu2026 this is the one.  Itu2019s perfect.
I purchased this product after watching many makeup videos and I was not disappointed! The formula is so creamy and not drying at all, I also have the matching concealer which I also love.
So light weight and glowy while also covering blemishes. I love this foundation because it gives me such a nice finish and makes my skin look amazing. Will continue to repurchase

Wow!! Decided to try after hearing so many positive comments, and I was not disappointed! This stuff is AMAZING! Long wear, buildable coverage , blurring doesnu2019t settle in my lines or pores , glow from within skin even oily skin friendly. Def a new HG for me

I had huge expectations for this product after reading the reviews and doing some research. Unfortunately, I was unable to find the right shade and the product has an unappealing smell. The foundation is light coverage- shocking. All in all, I would not recommend this product. It may be labeled as clean but caused major breakouts.
not for dry skin, clung to patches i didnu2019t even know i had. separated. I tried both a brush and a sponge, different primers, different moisturizers, same result.

I know this product is HG for most, but I found it to be suuuuuuper patchy. I used it in the summer, when my skin is combo/normal, and tried it with 2 different primers, and could not overcome the patchiness.

Nice finish forsure!! No more special than Nars or other top brands that are cheaper though. Not worth it IMO. Iu2019m not crazy about foundation, I prefer more of a tint Iu2019d say and I found this to be too much. Though I wouldnu2019t consider it a heavy foundation.
I love this foundation. I have super sensitive skin and had no reactions to this! Just a great foundation!

The best color match for my fair olive-toned skin.  I have never found a better match.  The finish is beautiful.  Sadly, it breaks me out every time I use it.  Worth a try if you have fair/light skin with cool olive undertones.

Iu2019m still in denial but this makes my skin so dry!!!! Super bummed. It took a few uses to figure it out but sure enough, I stopped using and back to normal. Iu2019ve never had a color match so well to my skin tone.

Immediately caused breakouts. Unfortunately, after two days of use, my clear skin suddenly started to get tons of small pimples. So frustrating. I didnu2019t notice anything phenomenal regarding staying power, finish, or glow.

I would have given this 5 stars but it started sinking into my pores all of a sudden and I have no idea why! When I first started wearing it was gorgeous! Wore beautifully. Now it does not. I donu2019t know if itu2019s because itu2019s summer verses or winter or what. Very bummed.

reviews.review_title: Game changer for oily skin & textured skin
reviews.review_text: Although I got maybe a color too light for me, the coverage and lasting is INSANE. I have always thought it was normal to get greasy or oily through out the day with any foundation I have used. not once did I get oily using this foundation. Iu2019m obsessed and completely sold on it!
I finally got to try it. It's a good color match and it blends well. However, the fragrance is so strong that it gave me a headache. I hope they release a fragrance-free version

reviews.review_title: Gourgeous skin like finish, doesn't feel heavy
reviews.review_text: I have tried a lot of foundations (makeup forever, dior, Mac, haus labs) however, this is by far my favourite one. The finish is so Luminous and skin like. it doesn't emphasize my dry patches or skin texture. it looks absolutely beautiful on! I would highly recommend this. they also have a range of beautiful shades for olives :)
Such a beautiful foundation. Feels like it soaks right into the skin and looks so natural. Easily becoming one of my favorites!

The price point made me hesitant, BUT after doing so much research decided to give it a try. TOTALLY worth the price. I have combo skin and my foundation always seemed to cake throughout the day, no matter what I tried. Now I use Milk Hydrogrip primer on my face and apply the Armani with a wet beauty blender. One pump is all you need. For my nose I donu2019t use primer, but the u201chairspray methodu201d which works sooo well at making my nose makeup not separate!  And the shade match quiz for me from Too Faced to Armani, spot on BUT an even better match!
Still, nothing can beat it for me!  Only for a short period Dior Airflash was No 1 favorite, and after it was discontinued Armani took its No 1 place back!

This foundation is perfect for a glowy look and will last while being in the heat. It matched my tan perfectly! After being in the heat for 3 hours for photos and having it on for a total of 5 hours, it still looked the same! I would definitely go in the store to find your shade because I went u201cdarkeru201d than my shade match.
Looks like paper on my face, no matter how moisturized i am or i use primer. Too bad, since it was expensive.
Very smooth application. Not greasy or cakey, even after wearing it all day.
Iu2019ve tried a lottttt of foundations and this is literally the only one I donu2019t break out with. Sometimes my skin looks a little dry with this on but Iu2019ll take it over insane breakouts.

Used to use Estee Lauder and I've seriously been missing this Armani foundation all my life! Not heavy, feels truly weightless and the colour match is perfect. No breakouts. Blends easily and the pump is no fuss, just the right amount comes out and feels more controllable. I bought the mini version as I don't wear foundation everyday so I'm glad there is a smaller.

reviews.review_title: Love it but shades are confusing
reviews.review_text: This is my all time favorite and I always end up goi v back to it. I love that it doesnu2019t look or feel heavy, but still provides coverage. My only complaint is that the shade numbers make no sense. For example, shade 5 is light neutral, but shade 4.5 is light to medium neutral. Itu2019s confusing that the lower number would be darker.

reviews.review_title: Meh theres better out there, not for sensitiveskin
reviews.review_text: I agree with the other reviews that you can get the same look or better for less/drug store. this is good for someone who likes very light coverage and has dry skin. However it my eyes and broke out my sensitive skin. I will stick with my Maybelline super stay skin tent Connie even better or make up forever. Skin tint ufffc ufffcufffc

reviews.review_title: Pretty but can achieve this look at a lesser price
reviews.review_text: Pretty but there are other foundations at a lesser price point that can achieve the same or very similar look. If my skin is clear it looks nice, but it still doesnu2019t cover hyperpigmentation. It isnu2019t even really worth trying to build it up in those areas but I find the Luminous Silk concealer does work much better for that.   If my skin is recovering from a breakout, on the other hand, it shows every little bump and area of texture.   I like that it dries down and sets on the face rather than moves around all day unlike some of the other medium coverage, radiant/natural foundations out there. Overall, I canu2019t see myself buying a full size version of this at full price, but if itu2019s your HG and a price point youu2019re comfortable with, I can see the appeal for sure.
I really like this foundation because itu2019s lightweight and buildable. You can determine if you want medium coverage or more with it and it doesnu2019t leave you feeling or looking cakey.
I think they changed the formula. Itu2019s not the same as before. Not worth the hype

reviews.review_title: Fantastic professionals lead to stellar products.
reviews.review_text: I stepped into Sephora by impulse after a long illness. I had given up on make up. The the Avalon location in GA is stellar. The lady who advised me and the manager were so welcoming and skilled. I would have never thought this foundation or the color matched me, but it's perfect. I felt pampered and found a holy grail foundation.

This foundation is just wow!!!!!! I bought the mini because I already have too many foundations I havenu2019t finished but I wanted to use this one for my wedding day. My skin, my makeup, has never looked so amazing.

I wanted to hate this because I'm not a luxury brand girly I try to remain as budget as possible but GIRL. I had to return it because I got the wrong shade and am waiting until the summer to repurchase but it was so good. Smooth, full coverage, buildable, really covers acne texture so well. No discolouration or oil buildup over time, honestly it was the best foundation I have ever used. Totally worth the luxury purchase this time.   To be clear there is lots of acne under the foundation in this picture, so that should say plenty!

I was hesitant to purchase this at first due to the mixed reviews, but that's with all products, some will love it, and others won't etc..  I'm so glad I took the chance and purchased it. Looks flawless, silky, luminous. I didn't notice any strange, or strong smells. Talk about disappearing into the skin, blends like a dream.   Pros - Natural, radiant finish - Lightweight feel - Buildable medium coverage - Extensive shade range - Suitable for MOST skin types  Cons - High price point - May not be the best for extremely oily skin without a mattifying primer  Overall, THIS Foundation is a top choice for those seeking a natural, radiant look with a LIGHTWEIGHT feel and buildable coverage..
Excellent product. Good coverage but not heavy at all.  Smooth and great blend.  Perfect colour.

reviews.review_title: Works well with your other skin care products!
reviews.review_text: I purchased Armani Beauty Mini Luminous Silk in shade 5.9. I have fair skin with neutral undertones and was shade matched at Sephora. I have applied this soft creamy liquid foundation with fingertips and with my brush and prefer the look after using just my fingers. It applies smoothly and has a flattering luminous finish. To me, the coverage looks more light than medium. It feels very comfortable on the skin, like I'm not wearing anything, but each time I saw myself in the mirror throughout the workday, my skin looked so pretty. I have combination skin and did have to apply a little powder to my T-zone a couple to times in the afternoon, which I would have to do with any foundation. I also have worn this foundation with Revision Tinted moisturizer with SPF underneath, and it worked well. As an experiment, I have also mixed some with a little full coverage matte foundation, and I really like the result! It is obviously a very versatile foundation.

reviews.review_title: Drying af, but good colour match
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this foundation. The reviews were all really promising. The colour match was insanely spot on which is rare for me. It dried out my skin. And just felt like dry on my skin with skin prep. Tried it for 2 weeks.
It smells like paint and I did not receive any compensation for it

I love this!! I'm 51 and I am starting to have fine lines and some wrinkles and this is light and doesn't feel heavy or settle into my wrinkles and get cakes. It's a bit pricy though. I think that's the only down fall.
Forever my go to. Itu2019s perfectly light weight while still giving enough coverage. I donu2019t have acne so this might not work if you need more coverage

reviews.review_title: Hate it when everyone is right
reviews.review_text: I hate spending money. Is this expensive, yes...but...it's actually worth the money. Good coverage, lightweight and a little goes a long way. Haus Labs just got moved to my #2 favorite. I'll be buying this one again.

It is not a bad foundation but I do not see a difference in the performance or finish between this expensive foundation and the drug store foundations I love. For the price of this it should change my life. Its fine but I am not impressed.
Very smooth finish. I have dry and flaky skin so itu2019s hard to find something that dries down well. This is one of the very few products that agrees with my skin texture.

I really really donu2019t understand the love for this foundation. It has almost no coverage and on top of that it takes any texture I have an amplifies it. Thankfully I only bought the mini size because this is truly in my top 5 worst foundations Iu2019ve tried.

Iu2019m glad I gave this foundation a second chance! It has a natural semi-matte finish, feels very lightweight on the skin, and sets fast without leaving any sticky feeling. I'm really pleased with the result!

This is so easy to use!!! I absolutely love it, Ive been trying this on with the Dior Filter 4N. It gives such a beautiful soft glow. Sooo perfect! I definitely recommend this foundation. I also, have have dry cheeks and oily forehead.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful, lightweight foundation for all day wear
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful, medium coverage foundation. Easy to build up coverage. Works best with a primer though. Doesn't feel heavy on my skin; perfect for warmer weather and longer wear.
This formula works awesome on my skin the base laid on me smooth and last me all day whit out the shiny skin just love it and is one of my favorite foundation

reviews.review_title: Just a great formula with a ton of shades
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this formula. Stays on my face for a long time, isnu2019t so dewy that I look sweaty :-) but not matte so I look older. This is my summer shade and I have a lighter shade for winter - thatu2019s how much I like it.
Just perfect. Natural but with coverage low to high as it can be buildable. Flawless.

The foundation applied nicely, and felt lightweight and smooth. Unfortunately, it did not last for long. After just a few hours my skin looked and felt greasy, and the coverage was no longer effective. I'm in my late 40s and have combination skin. I do not use a primer or powder as I like to keep my routine simple. The power fabric formula works better for me.

reviews.review_title: oily girls can use it too
reviews.review_text: I love the way this foundation looks in photos and in person. I use my fingers to blend and it's seamless. I'm very oily so I shy away from anything that isn't matte - but this really gives a nice look to the face

reviews.review_title: The perfect amount of an already great foundation
reviews.review_text: I already know I love this foundation, itu2019s been a staple in my makeup bag for a long time. Love the fact that it looks like actual skin, the shade range and that it doesnu2019t oxidize. When getting a new bottle I see that they now make a mini size and itu2019s perfect, just enough quantity to actually use it before it expires and at the same price per fluid ounce than the full size one. So youu2019re not paying extra and the wallet is happier.

reviews.review_title: The sample tester pamphlet helped find my color
reviews.review_text: I purchased my first Armani luminous silk perfect glow flawless finish about a year ago from both Sephora and Armani Beauty. Now I am using light to medium neutral 4.5. I love it.     When I am in a really mad rush. I just simply apply the makeup only. And then begin to do a quick eye and brown   Finish.
LOVEE THIS SO MUCH. Nice coverage, looks beautiful, and lasts me all day. I work in a school and am running around all day and this did not get oily or gross on me.

reviews.review_title: Love the foundation but the price just went crazy
reviews.review_text: Omg! I am happy I purchased this foundation which is my first time using and this shade is perfect for me but I am absolutely terrified and shocked seeing the increased on the price of everything at Sephora. Itu2019s absolutely ridiculous!!!

I really wanted to love this product due to the good reviews I saw, but it did not work for me. This foundation easily separated on my combination skin and didn't seem to completely match my skin tone. Had big expectations that were not met unfortunately. Also seemed to accentuate my dry patches on my cheeks as well.

reviews.review_title: Starts out great but doesnu2019t last
reviews.review_text: I had really high hopes based on reviews but this one disappointed me. The shade range is amazing, one of the best matches. It goes on silky just like everyone saysu2026 but after an hour it is so cakey and flakes off. Sadly returning this one.,

Well, I finally tried it. I have been a Dior forever flow foundation the last several years, and I figured I would give this a try. This is a good product, but I like Dior better for my skin. The color was pretty good, and the wear also good throughout the day. Unfortunately it didnu2019t beat out Dior for me. It looked a little dull in comparison. On the upside, it didnu2019t irritate my skin, and I am prone to breakouts in my chin area. I get the appeal, I just have a better foundation for me.

This is just amazing. I love how it feels love how it sits and last all day. My only two cons are of course the price for a mini is so much but itu2019s a good size mini to actually it out  and it smells awful to me. Smells like latex gloves but luckily the smell doesnu2019t last.

reviews.review_title: Best shade range of all foundations I've tried.
reviews.review_text: I have struggled for a long time to find a shade that matches me, Armani nails the olive undertone really well and would highly recommend to anyone with similar undertones. This foundation blends seamlessly and leaves a very natural finish, while it's not as much coverage as I normally like, that is easy to achieve with just spot concealing in those areas.
This foundation is seamless looks like your skin not make-up. The color is a natural color that looks like my skin but better.

reviews.review_title: Not great for sensitive acne prone skin
reviews.review_text: I was recommended this by an employee and sadly it did not work for me. While the finish is beautiful every time i used it my face would break out after. I had to return it. Also feel itu2019s overpriced.
I use shade 7.5 during summer months when I am tan. Itu2019s my favorite foundation. Most foundations make me break out, except this one. Chmoisturizers.
I waited to buy this foundation during the sephora  sale, but it is worth every cent. I will buy it again and again. The way it blends into my skin so effortlessly is incredible.
Stays on the top of skin and doesnt blend no matter what. Makes me look really untidy. Maybe i used the wrong shade!

This is my first foundation I ever bought (at 38 years old) because I never used foundation until recently where I had to cover up my u201cimperfectionsu201d. It feels so smooth on the skin and blends really well. I am happy with my purchase.
I love this foundation,it doesnu2019t cover my freckles and adds the beautiful glow!
AMAZING! gives the best kind of GLOW! I only wear this for special occasions as the price is a tad steep.
Best light weight medium coverage foundation on the market! It covers my redness so well, doesnu2019t emphasize my texture and has a skin like finish!
The shade is perfect and very dewy. I chose this brand based on multiple reviews and it certainly hasnu2019t disappointed

This foundation has a stunning finish but I rate this product poorly because after testing multiple days for a couple weeks, none of the darker shades matched my undertones. At the end of the day I would either look too red or too orange. Ended up returning.

Definitely worth the hype. I bought it for a Cancun wedding and it lasted all day and night through sweat in the intolerable humidity. It never breaks up on me when wearing normally and never accentuates any dryness from retinues use.

wow, the hype is real with this foundation! it made my skin look so smooth, as if i had a filter on. it didnt settle into my pores either. i love that it dries down matte and doesnt need to be set with powder. i have an oily t zone and it kept it under control pretty well. i didnt experience any oxidation either. the only thing i didnt love (besides the price) was how hard it was to color match. took me 4 tries!

Definitely worth at least trying. I have combo dry/oily skin and this separated SLIGHTLY in my zone not matter what I did. However, This is a really incredible foundation that could work for a lot of people but for me it was a little too matte for my liking - BUT it was incredible for my fine lines it did not bunch in the creases which I was blown away by!!!

I am very impressed by this Armani Luminous Silk foundation. My complexion is dry and I struggle with redness. I chose the 4- light golden and it is an exact match to my skin tone. No caking, no flaking, no creasing. Just a soft glow still on my face. I didnu2019t want to take it off. I will definitely repurchase this foundation.

reviews.review_title: So glad I tried this foundation !!
reviews.review_text: I never wear foundation and rarely makeup; but at 60 I am dealing with age spots ! This color was spot on for my complexion it is so light feeling and the coverage is amazing ! I wear it everyday !! Work outs and all!!
Love the actual formula and how it wears on the skin, but canu2019t find a color match for light yellow with olive undertones - every option is too pink, too light, or too dark, unfortunately.

It doesn't matter how much I prep my skin with hydrating products, this foundation seems to highlight all the dry patches I didn't even know existed. Not only that, but this just sits on my skin and emphasizes my pores (it looks like a pool of foundation sitting on my skin). It's gotten to the point that every time I wear it I regret and contemplate washing my face and starting over. I'm really not a fan of this foundation and won't be repurchasing.

reviews.review_title: Comparable to many drug store brands!
reviews.review_text: I am middle aged and very prone to breakouts and have some fine to medium lines. This foundation is absolutely not worth the hype. Especially for the outrageous price. I had to use a ton in order to cover any imperfections. If you are young with flawless skin, then maybe. But itu2019s still extremely overpriced for what it does. To me, it was more like a watery, tinted serum. I donu2019t use heavy foundation but itu2019s weird that this product is even sold as a foundation. I returned it. It caused small pustules as well.
Gives a perfect glowy finish, been my go to for years!
Made my skin look really smooth and glowy! good quality foundation, I would repurchase.
If you live in a humid place and have oily skin, stay out of it. The foundation starts to melt.
Looks just like skin!! but make sure that you heavily moisturize beforehand or it can separate.

Iu2019m not the type to buy into high priced makeup products but Iu2019ve struggled with foundation since I started using makeup. The color match is phenomenal and I had to order it online. Its a true neutral, feels weightless on the skin and hasnu2019t caused any breakouts. I couldnu2019t recommend this product enough. Will be getting the full size. Worth the price.

Genuinely sad at how much I disliked this foundation. I've heard so many glowing reviews about it being worth the price--so many influencers raving about it--but after trying it twice, in two different shades, I was not impressed at all. It highlighted every pore and fine line, and sat patchy on the skin. I just hit my early 40's, have combination skin with uneven coloring, and have been on a foundation search for awhile. I was ready to invest in this if it lived up to the hype, but for me it did not even come close. This might be best for those with smoother skin who just want a light coverage to even out an already fabulous complexion.
Natural-looking foundation with good coverage.  The shade is great. My skin is sensitive and I have not had any issues with irritation while using this foundation.

This is such a beautiful foundation. I used this years ago and came back to it as I want a one-and-done foundation for everything. This is light enough for daily use or can be layered up for a bit more coverage. I have light but olive skin and 3.5 is PERFECT. Also I lean more oily and am acne-prone, this does not bother my skin at all and stays with a spray or setting powder.

At 64, I had to re-think my foundation. Tried a few, and this one has the semi-natural look I like as well as ease of application. I donu2019t apply a lot, but still has good coverage. Looks better on me as day goes on. Helps blur my pores and evens my skin. Will buy again.

reviews.review_title: Donu2019t trust Sephora employees to color match
reviews.review_text: I want to love this so bad but itu2019s so hard to when the lady who color matched me gave me a much lighter shade than I needed and even after I brought it up to her, she said u201cit will even out when you put on bronzeru201d leaving me pressured to buy it. Iu2019ve been testing it out trying to make it work and unfortunately Iu2019ve ran out of time to return it and just left disappointed especially with this price tag.

I think this would be a great foundation if the girl had matched me correctly. She first chose a color that was way too light and still asked what do you think of this one? The second one looked ok in store but she also didn't offer to try another shade so I felt pressured into buying the shade I took home. I'm going to be returning it.

This foundation is so good. I have combo oily skin and when I try to use matte foundations it looks so cakey and when I use hydrating foundations I look like an oil slick. Not the case with this product my friends!  Perfect balance and feels like my skin!
This is the best foundation I have found in awhile. It does not dry me out and holds up throughout the day nicely
I love how this product looks on my face, but the chemical smell in this bottle is really gross. Maybe I have old stock of something? Cant say I will buy again unless I can smell it first.

Iu2019m in my 40s with oily skin. I previously used a matte oil-control foundation but wasnu2019t happy with it because it was settling into my fine lines and making me look older than I am. I tried a bunch of different foundations, all different price points from Elf to Lamcome. This is the best one by a mile and itu2019s worth every penny. It is the only one that I looked and felt good in for an entire work day and into the evening. My skin feels so nice, not greasy or heavy at all, and it does not emphasize fine lines. The consistency is on the thinner side so it glides on easily, After cleansing. I use LaRoche-Posay matte moisturizer, then Maybelline Baby Face primer, then 1 to 1-1/2 pumps of foundation. Try it!! I first tried it in Sephorau2019s foundation sampler pack, which is $10 and includes a coupon for $10 off a full-size foundation.

Long-wear holy grail with an AMAZING pigment for the olive tones out there. Will buy again and again. I have the full-size, but I prefer the mini. Theyu2019re SO cute and they leave more room in my makeup case! Itu2019s a full coverage, but light enough to use with underpainting technique OR the old-school technique. Love, love, love.
really pretty and beautiful natural finish but it broke me out so bad :/ idk why but i get acne and rashes from this

The formula is beautiful and so comfortable especially on my dry, sensitive skin. I started noticing that after I wore it, I would have little breakouts. I wore it for years so it must be my skin changing.  Must myThis will be my last bottle.
This a serum-like foundation and I like how light it feels on the skin however this oxidizes badly and gets patchy after 6 hours. Nonetheless, this is great when you mix it with Dior foundation.

At first, I wasn't finding the right shade for my skin type until I ran into the Armani Beauty Rep and she was able to find the perfect match for me. It looks as if I have no make up on. I will be buying this again.
I donu2019t get what all the rage is over this foundation. Itu2019s thin and not that buildable, not luminous, and just kind of flat. I really donu2019t like it much at all.
This is a great foundation, it really melts into your skin. I have really dry skin, and a lot of foundations donu2019t sit well on my skin throughout the day but this one is great!
A good cream for oily skin. My skin 45+ is dry and I need good moisturising care before application.
A must have for the dry skin girlies! Has good coverage but not cakey. I really like this foundation!

After reading glowing reviews of this product for years, I finally decided to try it. I was shocked at how bad it is. It should be called u201cArmani Pore Highlighteru201d because it thatu2019s where it settled almost exclusively.
I was never a foundation girl but this stuff is IT! Not heavy, stays on all day, feels great for everyday. Provides good coverage and a smooth finish. I don't feel the need to try anything else ever.
This product transferred onto everything - if I blew my nose, the tissue was covered in foundation. It also amplified my pores and fine lines. Going back to my Koh Gen Do Foundation.

The BEST foundation for mature/aged skin. I loved this product so much because it is lightweight and still offers coverage, so I put my mother on to it also. She says: it's like there is nothing on my face.

This foundation is awesome!! Lightweight with beautiful coverage.  It feels better on than a skin tint.  I tried it with several primers but I prefer wearing it without a primer.  The only reason 4 stars is because of the price..

Jai recu un mini sample avec mes points et je suis en amour avec ce fond de teint  Et jessaye de me convaincre du2019acheter le mini format mais il est trop dispendieux ! Un fond de teint qui me fait rever je le recommande P

reviews.review_title: Not the coverage I was looking for
reviews.review_text: Very low coverage. It feels good on the skin but for the price I need it to COVER up everything. Good if youu2019re looking for something with light coverage.
I understand the hype for this foundation. It is very well made and doesnu2019t feel cakey at all. The price tag kills me though. Definitely, only wear for it for certain occasions.

reviews.review_title: Nice but not holy grail material.
reviews.review_text: There has never been another foundation shade that has matched me this well and it is does not look like youu2019re wearing foundation. I get told that often however, for the price, the coverage is too light and it gets oily on me quickly and my skin type isnu2019t even oily. I put powder throughout the day and another fuller coverage product on some problem areas on my cheeks. You might love it if you donu2019t have light-ish to dark acne marks and if your skin is very dry.

I feel like I have tried every popular foundation, skin tint, tinted moisturizer, etc that there is except for this one. Itu2019s advertised as luminous so being an oily skin gal, I clearly stated far away from it. I have oily, sensitive skin and most foundations/skin tints make me break out. This is acne safe and works SO well on my sensitive skin with no issues. Plus it looks incredible!!! Natural and flawless. You can build it up or sheer it out and either way it just always looks amazing. I prefer light/sheer coverage and this just hits all the marks for me. I finally found my holy grail, I am so blown away. 100% recommend this!!

obsessed with this foundation! i was hesitant because sometimes things are completely overhyped by these youtubers and influencers but i love this so much. it feels so lightweight and soft. it blends well and is super buildable. i also struggle to find anything that matches my skin tone because everything is too yellow and too dark, but this is the best match i've ever found.  just make sure you use a silicone based primer because this foundation is silicone based. i would say it has pretty medium coverage. it's not actually that luminous though, but as someone who has been doing a more matte look for years that's okay with me!

I used this for my wedding make-up so I needed something long lasting and light because it was a destination wedding in hot humid weather. This stayed put all day long and I love how it's buildable and just the right amount of coverage with a natural glowy finish. I have sensitive and dry skin and this foundation made my skin look flawless and great in photos.

reviews.review_title: Read ingredients first. Not for acne prone skin!
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t really write reviews but I had to after trying out this foundation to help out my girls who have acne prone/sensitive skin. This is the first time I try this foundation and when I first applied it I immediately felt a sting on my face and smelled alcohol. So I went back on Sephora to check out the ingredients. Not to my surprise I read that alcohol and glycerin are in the first 5 ingredients listed. I will be returning as these 2 ingredients are extremely harsh for skin especially acne prone. Wanted to love it but unfortunately will be returning.

Unfortunately, didn't work well for my dry combo skin, it looked very patchy around my nose and didn't give me that airbrushed look that I was looking for in a foundation. I like how it feels super lightweight though.

This was recommended to me by a Sephora worker. She color matched me in store, and I couldnu2019t love it more! My favorite part is how buildable it is; you can wear a little or a lot and it still looks amazing. 10/10 recommend.

I got a sample of this. I loved it so much, despite it being out of my budget...I had to buy it. I don't often wear foundation, but when I do this now my go to! Just a light layer evens out my complexion for no makeup-makeup look.it's also buildable, which ids great, too! Love it!
I was a bit worried bc I have oily skin, but the finish is very natural and healthy looking. It lasted me the whole the night and felt super light on the skin.

reviews.review_title: Okay but not great for pores/dry skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely not great for pores or dry areas. Only thing I like is the texture of foundation and how long the foundation stays throughout the day.

reviews.review_title: Excellent product, feels like nothing on your skin
reviews.review_text: This make up is amazing. I have mature skin, but this is very moisturizing, even though it is oil free. It goes on super light and blends well. Feels like nothing on your skin, but still gives great coverage. Iu2019ve tried everything in by far this is the best. A little goes a long way.
Heard such great reviews - unfortunately for me it sits on top of my skin and doesnu2019t blend . Will not be repurchasing

Iu2019m not a foundation person, I donu2019t like a lot of product on my face because I feel like it emphasizes my lines and imperfections. This foundation is amazing! Light weight and blurs everything on my face. I love this so much. Itu2019s expensive but so worth it!

This is the best foundation Iu2019ve ever owned. Iu2019ve tried many other foundations and nothing really fit my skin or it never looked how I wanted a foundation to look on my skin. I have combination skin and I love how it sits on my face and how flawless it looks

Anyone claiming this isn't working for them simply isn't applying it correctly or they are using it in combination with incompatible primers/moisturizer. This is the best foundation money can buy and absolutely worth every penny. I've tried dozens of 'the best' foundations over the years but nothing comes close to armani luminous silk. Gorgeous finish, flexible/buildable coverage, long lasting, and feels great and light on the skin.
I have oily skin, and this foundation is perfect. It looks just like skin, and many of my friends havenu2019t noticed that I have had on makeup when I wore this.
THIS IS MY FAVORITE FOUNDATION OF ALL TIME. this foundation leaves my face looking effortlessly flawless, and dewy. i love how natural it looks, and how much coverage it has without looking cakey!
The shade was a perfect match for my skin tone, but this foundation is not great if you have dry skin. It immediately starts to flake & makes my dry patches much worse.

I was SO excited to try this foundation and unfortunately will be returning.  My first impression was a noticeably bad scent followed by a burning sensation upon applying it. This product made my entire face feel irritated even my eyes.  Next, I noticed a ton of dry patches and pilling despite full skin prep. I have oily skin and have never had a foundation cling to dry skin like this did.  After a few hours of wear, it has disappeared from the middle of my face despite setting with a loose powder. So disappointed!

reviews.review_title: Perfect color but doesn't stay well
reviews.review_text: I love the color of this and it's the perfect color if you wore Smashbox and have discovered how awful their new shades are consider looking at this brand. This is so much more breathable for your skin too. The only problem is that it's not very buildable. My skin is basically flawless but the tiniest little thing will show under this foundation. I also have sensitive combination skin that leans towards dry. This feels moisturizing for my skin but it doesn't stay put around my nose which is unusual for me to have this problem. Because it's not staying put and covering even super minimal spots I want to look for some thing else but the color line is fantastic! I think if you have a hard time finding a shade this is still worth a go.
The most beautiful foundation I have ever used, I have worn it dancing and to work out and it doesnu2019t budge.

reviews.review_title: it's a no from me, dawg
reviews.review_text: I do not understand the hype. It looked great when applied - satiny and perfect but by the end of the day it's like it lifted off my face. I had to return. I used high quality surrounding products too.
Loved it Stayed put and was not heavy at all Would recommend for party makeup A little extra for everyday
LOVE THIS FOUNDATION!!! It looks beautiful on the skin. It is very comfortable and lasted all day.
bestttt foundation thatu2019s all . I have it in every shade for every season
I used this product couple times but it leaves patches, and does not really blend into the the skin. I have returned it

This used to be my go to YEARS ago, decided to bring it back in my makeup routine because itu2019s the only foundation that Iu2019ve tried that MATCHES my skin tone. With that said, it did have an off putting smell that I donu2019t remember it ever having. Not sure if the formula has changed a bit or what but, it wasnu2019t my favorite thing.

Don't understand the hype surrounding this foundation.  Very disappointed.  The coverage is not good and it doesn't stay on the skin but melts off in a few hours and leaves streaks.  I wouldn't recommend this foundation.  Drug store foundations are better than this and I don't even like drug store foundations.
This foundation really set a new bar for me in terms of what I now expect from a foundation. The first time I wore it, I felt airbrushed. I really love it.
This and the nars are the only foundations I will use. I have very sensitive dry skin and this has buildable coverage and blends in so smoothly
Love this foundation! Expensive but great for dry skin and color matched perfectly! Not super glowy though
Very beautiful! medium coverage. it glides so nicely and I will definitely buy this product again!

Ok so I have dry skin and I'm at Florida so not such a cold weather and my skin looks dry, iI bought it because to give it a try on the hype, but is no for me! i prefer a 100% the skin tint from hourglass, a little bit more expensive ver ML, but does the job. I did all my skincare as I used to and was a NO. Ill stay with the Hourglass.

Great foundation!  Iu2019ve been looking for a medium coverage foundation that matches my skin tone. I found some with nice formulations, but even the cool/pink shades looked yellow on my skin. This shade is perfect. ufffc
I wish I wouldu2019ve got this foundation sooner!!! I have texture skin and some hyperpigmentation. This foundation didnu2019t bring out my texture at all. I love it

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 5.2 - light to medium with a pink undertone
reviews.review_text: Great product goes on smooth.  I like the feel of it.

I've been using this foundation for years! If I ever try to branch out to try something new, I always come back to this one. Glowy, dewy, and fabulous finish. Easy to blend, not cakey, and no flash back. Definitely the best!
Love this stuff. Best foundation Iu2019ve ever used. Doesnu2019t even feel like you have anything on. Would buy again 10/10
I dont know why the hype but its ok. Armani has a strong scent like other high end makeup so i hate that smell.

I almost wish I didnu2019t like this as much as I do since itu2019s so pricey. I was worried about it being u201cluminousu201d since my skin is combo-oily. However, it stays pretty all day, needing only minor powder touch-ups.

I'll give it 3 stars because the color was spot on. It blends well, and it feels great. But for some reason, it brings out all my wrinkles. Maybe because it's full coverage? I'm used to a light coverage look. This was too much for me, personally.

reviews.review_title: exactly what I was looking for
reviews.review_text: just started wearing face makeup regularly, so it took years to run out of my glossier skin tint. I had that in u201cmediumu201d but their new expanded shade range doesnu2019t have an exact match for the original medium. This in shade 3.5 is ud83dudc4cud83cudffc and I love that I can keep it really sheer. It also keeps me less oily than the glossier one does. I know this is a cult fave and yes I do live under a rock and have indeed just tried this for the first time but I am happy to say it is as good as everyone says it is :)

reviews.review_title: Donu2019t buy, buy the makeup forever reboot
reviews.review_text: This is 45$ for 0.6 oz!  Literally the makeup forever reboot is the same thing but cheaper!  Reboot $42 for 1.01 oz.  There is no difference at all !
Top 2 fav foundations! it's definitely a medium to light coverage but is buildable. My fav oart is that it's silky but you don't need a setting spray with it!

reviews.review_title: acne babes, this is for you
reviews.review_text: the best foundation I have ever used. it's the most skin like one I have ever found while still giving great coverage. it doesn't dry me out or cause me to breakout. a really beautiful natural finish that has a subtle glow to make the skin look healthy

Iu2019ve been using this for about a year, and it is the best foundation ever! It goes on so smoothly and looks like my skin, but still covers my redness and acne. Iu2019ve tried other foundations but they either break me out or feel heavy.

This should have way more reviews. Iu2019ve been using u201cborn this wayu201d for years now bc I was afraid to try something else. But let me just say, this is the best one I have tried. It sits soo well on your skin. Perfectly blends in. So light which is what I like. You can wear this and not even feel like youre wearing anything. Top it off with some setting spray I use and I get a really nice glowy look!! The only thing I dont like is the price LOL.
