Probably my favorite foundation - I really like that they have the mini option because I tend to mix colors to achieve a perfect match (2, fair/peach + 3, golden). I love the thin consistency since it allows me to apply a light amount or build to a more full coverage. It does feel more hydrating than other foundations, but still requires the prepped skin to be very hydrated  + setting powder to avoid creases. It blends super well with the huda beauty contour cream.
Great medium coverage and lots of colour choice. No wonder it is a favourite of makeup artists.

reviews.review_title: The best foundation I've ever tried
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous, lightweight but full coverage foundation. Matched my skin tone perfectly and goes on like a dream. I can see why they call it silk because that is the only way to describe how it feels on your skin. My new favorite.

Iu2019ve been looking for a water based foundation as my silicone based foundation was separating too much with all of my water based skin products. My face has NEVER been so oily as it was after I used this  to.. I am
Argh!!!  TikTok made me buy itu2026.unfortunately itu2019s absolutely amazing.  Itu2019s so expensive though but whatever! Lays so nice on my skin.  Natural and flawless.

I was looking for a light weight and breathable foundation, and this is the ticket.  It goes on silky smooth and is easily layered.  It doesnu2019t feel too heavy or tacky.  I have some fine lines and some deep wrinkles and this doesnu2019t settle into them.  Glad I read reviews and decided to try it.
This is the best foundation ever. Every time I wear it I get compliments on how great my skin looks
This was $78 less than 2 months ago for the full size and now almost a 20$ increase for nothing!? Thatu2019s absolutely outrageous and price gouging. I will never repurpose. Absolutely disgusting
Love this foundation. It feels so natural and gives the perfect amount of coverage.
Best foundation ever used. Silky and gorgeous.  Little goes a long way. Apply with brush for more coverage. I think any negative review is because skin wasnu2019t prepped correctly.

Love Love Love! I don't know why it took me forever to try but better late than never. It lasts all day and gives it such a natural finish. The mini size actually lasts pretty long. A little goes a long way.
Best foundation Iu2019ve ever used. I have combination sensitive skin and have never had a breakout with this foundation. The finish is flawless, gives the skin medium coverage with a glow.

Totally wasn't expecting this kind of result.  i went in to get a foundaton to match my neck color and the sales person recommended this product.  it's light weight and covers well.  it diffuses light so you look like you are glowing when you put it on.  it wakes up your skin and face!  it's not expensive when you factor in the quality of the product and results.  i am very happy with this product.

THE BEST!!! No allergic reactions! no dry skin ! beautiful light texture ! 2 pumps for entire face ! .. Iu2019m 30 and my skin has changed so I have to be careful what I use now! Getting one for my mom too she is in her 50s and is obsessed !
Absolutely amazing and flawless. My color is a little off but after mixing it with a lighter color works perfect.

This foundation is beautiful, but you must go in store to find your ideal match! I have fair freckled skin.  Based on the online color match, shade 2.0 fair peach was the recommendation.  The color was way off and made my skin appear chalky.  I went into Sephora to get matched by a sales person and after the facial scan, 2.0 was still the recommended color. however both the kind sales person and I agreed it was way too light for my complexion, we experimented with other colors and my ideal match ended up being 4.5 light to medium neutral!  This is not a foundation youu2019ll want to order online because the color names do not match the actual foundation and the lowest number does not necessarily mean lightest.   In other words, this is a product to buy in store if itu2019s your first time using.  One more recommendation- the Armani primer does not work well with this product.  It causes the foundation to separate on your face.  I found makeup forever pore minimizer primer layered beautifully with Armani luminous silk or simply stick to an oil free primer.  Hopefully this review saves someone from the inconvenience of having to return.
Not worth the extra $. I think there are better and more affordable foundations.
I bought this for my mom she really likes it. Her skin is dry so it suites her face.
Bad formula, bad coverage and it came in a laughably small bottle. Overpriced garbage.
Looove this foundation! So lightweight and gives skin but better foundation. Buildable without being cakey.

This color is the closest to my actual skin that Iu2019ve ever found. Not only that but this provides the most radiant look without looking overly dewy. It is very buildable if you want more coverage and does a good job covering up my blemishes. This is my favorite foundation I have found in a long time and lasts forever on the skin   This foundation is my new go to and is well worth the price

I have combination, acne prone skin, and textured acne scarring. This foundation is really nice, it goes on smooth and looks like skin. For me personally though this is not medium coverage, I had to use 5-6 pumps to cover but it did not look cakey which I love! I think if you have smooth skin, 2-3 pumps would evenly cover. Also, no matter how much setting powder I use, my T-zone will eventually get oily and I get oily around my nose. The first time I used this foundation, I used less setting powder because I noticed my skin looked cakey with more powder, but I did not get as oily as I usually do which is a nice surprise. All in all, really like this foundation, but given the price point and the amount I have to use to cover my acne and scarring, not sure I would purchase again. Also, just an FYI, I would recommend trying this foundation on using the Armani website, for some reason the Sephora IQ match for this foundation was off by several shades but I checked on the Armani website and used the shade they recommended and it was correct!

So disappointed because this foundation is extremely hyped. It feels really dry going on and it accentuated all my pores and blemishes. Even my husband asked what was wrong with my skin. I normally use the hourglass foundation stick and ran out, so I thought I would give this a try. This is going to be returned, unfortunately. I had high hopes :(
This is my go to for events and even day to day. It looks like your skin but better. And it does not break me out

This foundation is such a holy grail product! For important events, I love to splurge on this foundation. I skin type is a combination and I have light acne scarring on my cheeks u2013 the coverage on this is amazing! The product isnu2019t heavy and covers all of the scarring that other foundations tend not to cover. Itu2019s definitely pricey, so I recommend purchasing it during one of the big sales that Sephora has.
Probably the worst foundation I have ever bought. Like I could buy the cheapest foundation at Walmart and it would be better than this. I will be returning.

reviews.review_title: beautiful but not long lasting on oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve always heard really great things about this foundation but it just didnu2019t work for me. itu2019s a nice thin consistency but after an hour or 2 of wearing it, it feels really thick and it makes me look really greasy
I personally loved this product. I got a free sample and tried it out. If you have dry skin I would recommend. It does have a weird smell to it though.
Armani Beauty - Mini Luminous Silk Perfect Glow Flawless Oil-Free Foundation 1.5 0.6 oz/ 18 mL Armani Beauty Mini Luminous Silk Perfect Glow Flawless Oil-Free Foundation

Ok, so not loving the price tag on this, but it is gorgeous and it does do what it says it does. Initially I thought they just had a steller marketing team with words like silk , glow and luminous, but I will be damned if that is what I saw and felt! I typically use a highligher, but with the glow i felt it would be too much (if there is such a thing??).  You can feel that there is clearly skincare in it too.   I know it says oil free, but I am not sure if this would be great on oily skin. I looked like a glowing goddess all day, but going to be honest with you, there were a few times thru the day I was worried if the glow might appear to be sweaty rather than glowy....so I think someone with more oily skin might feel even more so.  Those of you with dry skin, this would make you feel nourished for sure!
starts separating, feels heavy. just a mess. save your money and donu2019t buy this pleaseud83dude2d

I'm going to totally agree with other reviewers who mentioned smell!  a toxic chemical smell that I've never experienced in a foundation. Similar to formaldehyde. I have airway disease triggered by toxic smells and this foundation did my lungs in. 2nd it's very pricey for a small bottle. It does the job for nice coverage so 3 stars for that but I'm going back to Pat Mcgrath. Bigger bottle, nice light coverage and no smell.

Iu2019ve been using this product for months. Recently Iu2019ve been extremely disappointed with it. My foundation looks patchy and dry. I tried several different tricks and not a single one worked. My skin wasnu2019t even dry. Use caution with this, it might not be worth your money.
The best light weight foundation that doesnu2019t break me out!

reviews.review_title: Not worth it for the price
reviews.review_text: First off, this foundation smells bad. It doesn't offer much coverage and I've tried drugstore foundations that look far better. I've been using Charlotte Tilbury airbrush flawless longwear foundation which I LOVE. Try that instead and stay away from this overpriced mediocre product.
I really wanted to love this but it would not stay on my nose or cheeks no matter what I did. I gave it a 1 cause it didn't make my face break out. so disappointed.

Was recommended this by a Sephora staff member, I rarely wear foundation because of how heavy most brands feel to me - but this stuff is truly lightweight and isnu2019t a sensory nightmare at all which is a HUGE win. Itu2019s comfortable enough I might start wearing it everyday, which is something I never do. Iu2019d probably buy this again even at the price point.
Perfect! Applies like a dream. Would buy again. Worth the money.

reviews.review_title: If you want a no make up make up look
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation so much. This foundation is so good if you are like me who doesn't like heavy makeup on an everyday basis. I honestly don't like to wear makeup and I also don't know how to wear one. I also have very sensitive and oily skin so I am picky when it comes to choosing products for my face. This foundation doesn't give me any problems and it's so lightweight. This is my favourite foundation so far. Thanks to my Derma for recommending this foundation to me.
Skin like finish, lightweight but is not long lasting if you have oily skin

Iu2019m usually a light neutral/light-medium neutral in all brands, but this was a pretty good shade match! This product is easy to blend out and has a medium coverage, but can be buildable. For a more natural finish, use a sponge for application and for a move fuller coverage - it applies nicely with a dense brush as well! I usually prefer concealer for all-over coverage, but when I have an event to attend - this is my go-to foundation!

reviews.review_title: Great for light coverage with no caking!
reviews.review_text: Love this product. Very light formula which is what I've been looking for. Does not cake or crease on fine lines.

This is the OG best foundation ever in my opinion. Goes on flawlessly and wears beautifully. Skin like finish. I wouldnu2019t call it luminous but almost. Perfect shade for me. I will always go back to this foundation. ufffc

I love this foundation! Itu2019s light weight and doesnu2019t look cakey. I have dry skin and usually like a light to medium coverage  foundation that I can blend out with my fingers. I like thatu2019s itu2019s buildable.
I love this product. Really great buildable coverage. Doesnu2019t look caky and stays put all day on my oil skin.
Definitely need to find your shade in store but this is absolutely the BEST foundation on the market.
I LOVE this foundation! Super silky and leaves such a beautiful finish. Itu2019s hard to find foundations that carry lighter olive tones so their color selection is great!

It's a very good foundation. Long lasting, natural finish, can build up. The only thing is that it doesn't get on very well on the nose. I don't know why but even with a sponge or hand, the nose part always can't be applied very well.

reviews.review_title: Wow. Just wow. Mature skin approved.
reviews.review_text: It's a keeper, but dang it's expensive. Beautiful coverage and finish, softly matte but not dry looking. Doesn't settle into fine lines or wrinkles. Doesn't exaggerates texture. Gorgeous. A+
Very lightweight, buildable coverage and it blends beautifully. Wore this on my wedding day and it lasted all night long!

I tried this foundation 3 different times and itu2019s just not very good. Goes on very smoothly but too smoothly with very little coverage. And if you manage to build any coverage it fades quickly. Donu2019t get unless you have already perfect skin to begin with. NOT medium coverage as advertised.

I want to love this foundation since it's oil free and I'm combo-acne prone but I guess it wasn't for me. I tried the sample with 4 shades but all of them are the same. it settles into my lines and dry areas. my face looks so dry no matter how I  moisturize and prime.

Iu2019ve been trying to figure out a low cost foundation and everything from maybelline to Lu2019Oru00e9al breaks me out or irritates my skin . I AM NO LONGER applying anything on my face but THIS FOUNDATION . DO NOt cheap out on face products .

Stop looking, you wonu2019t find a better foundation. As someone who needs oil free products and has textured, acne prone, very fair skinu2026 I thought finding the perfect foundation was an impossible feat. But this has amazed me. Itu2019s worth every dime.
Iu2019ve been searching for the right foundation for years. This is it. Itu2019s light coverage and a super blend-able formula. Melts right in to my skin
I received product as a sample and instantly purchased it in full size. Gorgeous coverage and lasts all day!

reviews.review_title: Must-have out of all the foundations Iu2019ve used
reviews.review_text: I have tried many, but this one is amazing. The coverage is amazing, it will make you look flawless and not come off. Also, it is great for any skin type.

reviews.review_title: One of the worst foundations I've ever tried
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this foundation and disappointed with it. It has an awful odor, heavy texture, and makes skin look dry and cakey. One of the worst I've tried and I've tried a lot!
This is my go-to foundation when I want to look flawless and dolled up! It applies and wears so beautifully on the skin; and lasts a long time since you really donu2019t need to apply too much!

I had high hopes for this, but it's not as great as people say. The colour was good and it's not cakey and blends well. However, it smells awful, like chemicals. I've never used a product on my face that smells like this, I was hesitant to put it on. It also doesn't really cover anything. It didn't cover the under eye area or blemishes, I have tinted moisturizers that cover better and also aren't cakey and blend well. In my opinion, this is way over priced and over-hyped. I won't buy it again, and I'm happy I only bought the small one.

Iu2019ve been seeing the hype about this foundation for so long! Decided to try the mini during the sale. And I love it! It feels very light, gives me that u201cmy skin but betteru201d look. I give it a 4/5 because Iu2019ve only used it twice so far and want to see how I will like it during the summer time.

Je suis complu00e8tement en amour avec ce fond de teint! A mon sephora nous nu2019avons pas cette marque et ju2019hu00e9sitais a le commander par peur de recevoir la mauvaise teinte mais ju2019ai fait le shade Finder de sephora et la couleur u00e9tait parfaite. Cu2019est un fond de teint qui fait tru00e8s naturel, cu2019est votre peau en mieux. La couvrance est lu00e9gu00e8re u00e0 moyenne donc parfait pour celles qui aiment avoir un maquillage discret et qui veulent unifier et corriger leurs teints sans cakiness!
I have pretty dry skin and it didnu2019t cling to any dry patches and the color match was good BUT the coverage is very light. I just donu2019t think itu2019s worth the price- I will be returning.

Texture and finish are lovely, but finding the right shade when you don't live close enough to a store for in-person shade-matching is a huge pain. (Find My Shade doesn't work for me; previous go-to brand has changed their lineup). I'm generally a light neutral type, but on the sample card I had, 5 Light Neutral seemed a smidge too dark. Tried 4.5 Light to Medium Neutral, but definitely too dark. Tried 4.25 Light with Peachy Undertone, but although the shade is neither too light nor too dark, it's too peachy. What's my next option? Will 4 Light Golden be too yellow? The next shades up get into the Fair and Very Fair tones, golden, pink, olive, golden... do I just go straight to 1.5 Fair Neutral? Or will that be way too pale? The Armani Luminous Silk numbering system seems oddly complicated. Can't decide whether 3 stars because at least the texture and finish are gorgeous, or just 2 because texture/finish means nothing without the right shade, and I'm frustrated because I can't just exchange what I have on account my options are sold out after the Spring Sale. (Decision: 3 stars because I hope at some point to find my shade, despite the complications of living too far from a counter. And I'd recommend it if you can find your shade.)

This foundation is amazing. Let me start by responding to another review that said all the good ratings for this product are probably due to its brand name. Itu2019s not! Iu2019m personally someone who doesnu2019t care about the brand and have loved many products from the drugstore too, but I love this foundation! The texture is so lightweight, the color matches my skin perfectly, and its coverage is light to medium (closer to medium).  I have pretty good skin overall so I do need to cover much but I need to cover my blackheads and pores and want to have an even skin tone. This does all that pretty well. And it stays on for hours even though my T zone gets a bit oily after a few hours. If your skin is very oily it might not work perfectly for you but if your skin is anything like mine (combination) I think you may like it :)

I wanted to try this for so long, and everyone raves about it. I bought it during Sephora spring sale. First of all, this takes a lot more product than my usual foundations. Second of all, I would say it is light to medium coverage. I prefer my Yensa Silk Serum Foundation or Hourglass Stick Foundation as I am getting more coverage with less product.  Both of those melt into my skin and look really natural but I get more bang for my buck. I will use this for my summer shade when I want less coverage  but more than a tinted moisturizer. It looks nice but I was expecting something groundbreaking and amazing and this is just okay.
Skin looks so smooth and hydrated! It is very easy to apply on the skin and the skin looks matte and natural. I chose a color that can correct the dark spots on my chin, which works really well.

Still my favorite photo finish foundation. I had always used shade number five but recently tried 4.5 hoping it would work for my summer undertone and itu2019s perfect. I love it so much! Apparently I had been wearing an okay shade for me during winter, but I found that just a slight difference really suited me more. Armaniu2019s number lineup is very confusing. Be sure to check the undertones and then try out the three closest ones with the correct undertone in your shade range. I will say that Armani has very spot on undertones.

This foundation is okay. Not too much coverage. I used a fair shade that looked exactly like my tone on the model but made me look orange when I tried it on. Also made me break out. Probably wouldnu2019t use again

So happy I splurged on this! I personally donu2019t like a heavy look and one pump of this goes on flawlessly and looks like itu2019s my skin. Also, itu2019s very build able - I appreciate the option. After 12 hours of wearing this I have no complaints.

reviews.review_title: Expected great product - it exceeded expectation
reviews.review_text: I have very dry skin prone to breakouts. The only liquid foundation w/the coverage and quality was Estees double wear. This one might be better as itu2019s light weight, has coverage, doesnu2019t cause acne and can be applied with fingers. It also removes easier than more sticky makeup. Highly recommend

reviews.review_title: So sad to say it isnu2019t it
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this, but it continues to dry me out. I do all the extra steps to prep my skin for it, make my skin as dewy and moisturized as possible, and I think because it contains alcohol it just dries my skin. I am so bummed because I love the way it looks when I put it on, but after a few hours my skin looks peely. Iu2019ve used half of the mini and every freaking time it happens. Iu2019ve tried different skin preps with the same results.

reviews.review_title: My go to foundation - worth the price (I think)
reviews.review_text: I keep coming back to this foundation, I donu2019t like super dewy and I donu2019t like super matte. This is a good inbetween. Great for combination skin.

A friend recommended this to me and I tried her shade when we were on vacation (a bit more neutral than mine) and this still looked amazing. I changed to my warmer shade and just love this now. I don't wear makeup every day so I get the smaller size and then I feel like I end up wasting less when it expires--will definitely repurchase.

reviews.review_title: Hard to get the right color
reviews.review_text: An associate at Sephora gave me the wrong color for my complexion and now Iu2019m stuck with a foundation that doesnu2019t match I really wanted to love this product
delivers the most amazing natural finish.  I like to mix just a few drops with my moisturizer and blend for a beautifully luminous look.  highly recommend.

I mean - is this cheap? no. But it is most definitely worth the price. Highly recommend it to anyone who wants complexion coverage ( i have roseacea) but it have a light look that's not full heavy foundation.

This is one of the best foundations I have used. Itu2019s makes my skin so soft and itu2019s not ufffccakey at all. Itu2019s also very lightweight, whenever I wear it, it feels like I have nothing on my face. I definitely recommend.

Tried a sample of this and I like it a lot. It's slightly dark on me but I can make it work. I have the dior backstage and it's just a bit drying on me. I think this gives me a nice amount of light to medium coverage but it really feels like nothing. Definitely will be purchasing next time I'm in store and able to find my exact shade.

I'll probably never use anything else. It's like a second, perfect, skin. Color match perfect. No setting powder needed which is a FIRST for me, leave it to set for just a minute, spray with setting spray, good to go. I'm nearing 30 this year and it doesn't settle into my fine lines, which is what made me switch from my Anastasia foundation. This stuff is worth every penny.

The coverage is nice. I bought a different brand to apply to half of my face to compare. This went on very smoothly. I canu2019t see it settling into my fine lines just yet. Itu2019s a lovely product. combination combination skin so I wanted something not too matte

it felt like nothing looked different after applying. so i applied more and could still see my imperfections and redness other foundations cover. i had to use a different foundation on top of this. will most likely be returning.

reviews.review_title: Great everyday foundation.  Perfect color match!!
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this for about two weeks. Itu2019s very light on the skin and provides moderate coverage. The finish is satin. Not too matte but not too glowy either. I think itu2019s a great foundation for everyday use.
Light coverage but absolutely leaves a flawless look to your skin. I didnu2019t want to love it as much as I do, due to the price point but take all my money, because I am SOLD!

reviews.review_title: Highly recommend for mature, reddish skin.
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. It is so natural. It doesn't even look like I'm wearing anything. I'm 48 and many foundations I've tried are too drying, but this is perfect. I do use it with a primer too. Highly recommend for mature skin and fair/pink toned skin.
I got the mini as a gift and it's sooo good, great coverage but not cakey or too drying. however, the price is outrageous

This foundation feels like my own skin. It blends in perfectly for a flawless look. I apply with a moist beauty blender. I use Mac and Tarte normally but this is my new go to. I got it as a sample then bought the full size within a few days!
I received a sample of the foundation, loved it, so I splurged and bought it. I absolutely love it. Would highly recommend. However the smell is a little metallic.

Havenu2019t got to fully try out this product yet but so far it seems pretty good ufffc looks very stunning on the skin ufffc not as glowing as I thought it was going to be, but still looks good ufffc

I adore this foundation. It provides medium coverage for me and sits very naturally on my skin. It doesn't cake on my face and I have combination skin. I got coloured match with the 3.8 fair color and I have no regrets! Armani beauty knows what they are doing with this foundation. I do enjoy how simply the bottle looks as well.

reviews.review_title: Highly recommend for mature, reddish skin.
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. It is so natural. It doesn't even look like I'm wearing anything. I'm 48 and many foundations I've tried are too drying, but this is perfect. I do use it with a primer too. Highly recommend for mature skin and fair/pink toned skin.
